Messages.Value: Thank you for calling the travel agency, you're speaking with Lucas Thompson. How may I assist you today?

Hi Lucas, my name is Sarah Smith and I'm having some trouble with my upcoming trip to New York City. I booked with American Airlines and I'm having some issues with my flight and would like to know more about compensation options.
I'm sorry to hear that, Sarah. Can you please give me your reservation number and departure date for your American Airlines flight?
Sure, my reservation number is ABC123 and my flight is on January 10th at 3pm.

Thank you, Sarah. I can see there was a delay in your flight. American Airlines does offer compensation for delayed flights. You can either request a voucher or cash refund. Which option would you like to explore?
I'm not sure, Lucas. Can you give me more information about each option?

Certainly, Sarah. The voucher option is a credit given towards future flights with American Airlines. The cash refund option is a payment made to you directly for the amount of the compensation. Which option would you prefer?
I think I would prefer the cash refund option. Is there anything else I need to do to receive the compensation?
No, Sarah. American Airlines will contact you directly regarding your compensation. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, that's all, Lucas. Thanks for your help!

Customer: I'm not sure, Lucas. Can you give me more information about each option?

Agent: No, Sarah. American Airlines will contact you directly regarding your compensation. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
